The Program isaccredited and recognized by the Luxembourg Ministry of Higher Education and Research.This degree is dedicated to ambitious students who want tostart their professional careers in Luxembourgand prepares for a wide range of areas, such as Finance, Tax , Accounting, Project Management and many more.Key facts about the
column7: For Students who do not need a Visa or Authorization to Stay in Luxembourg, the total tuition fees for the two-year program is EUR 22,000For Students who need a Visa or Authorization to Stay in Luxembourg, the total tuition fee for the two-year program is EUR 24,000.
